boat.construction_details: Fir plank on Steam bent frames
boat.full_description: Sailing grounds San Juan and Gulf Islands. Underwent extensive rebuild of hull planking and deck /cabin in mid 80's in Port Townsend, New engine, cabin work, and rig added in mid 90's by Whittier Boatworks in Friday Harbor, Rig is new and designed especially for the boat. The original did not have a rig even though to look at the hull you would classify it as a sailboat hull.
boat.name: Betsy
